thread.title: House Republicans Lay Out Health-Care Plan - WSJ
thread.title_full: House Republicans Lay Out Health-Care Plan - WSJ

author: Michelle Hackman
title: House Republicans Lay Out Health-Care Plan - WSJ
text:
@stepharmour1 Feb. 16, 2017 7:36 p.m. ET 
WASHINGTONâ€”House Republican leaders sketched out a plan to repeal the Affordable Care Act, offering a set of policy specifics but showing they have yet to bridge significant GOP divisions over many of its components. 
The proposal, whose backers include House Speaker Paul Ryan (R., Wis.), came as President Donald Trump promised to deliver an initial repeal and replacement plan in March. 
The plan from House GOP leaders would... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
